title: Astratto – Design Agency Website
description: A modern and visually rich design agency website with smooth animations, clean layouts, and a premium UI feel. Focused on branding, motion, and presentation.

title: Moviq – Streaming Platform
description: A movie streaming platform UI that showcases movies with rich visuals, modern layouts, and a cinematic browsing experience.

title: Razorpay Clone
description: A responsive Razorpay landing page clone built to replicate real-world fintech UI, layouts, and component structure with pixel-accurate design.

title: DVSY Fashion Store
description: A fashion e-commerce style frontend with modern product layouts, smooth transitions, and a clean Tailwind-powered design.

title: Productivity Dashboard
description: A productivity-focused dashboard that presents tasks, metrics, and daily insights in a clean and structured layout.

title: Pokemon Saga
description: A fun and interactive Pokémon-themed application displaying Pokémon data with dynamic UI, animations, and engaging visual presentation.

title: Modern Contact List
description: A modern contact management application with clean UI, responsive design, and smooth user interactions for managing contacts efficiently.

title: Web Editor
description: A browser-based code editor that allows users to write and preview HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in real time with a clean developer-friendly interface.

title: Pinterest Style Gallery
description: A responsive Pinterest-style image gallery layout featuring a masonry grid, smooth hover effects, and a clean visual-first design.

title: ALVY Studio Website Clone
description: A pixel-accurate clone of the ALVY Studio website featuring bold typography, smooth transitions, and a premium studio-style layout.

title: Apple Website UI Clone
description: A clean and minimal Apple website UI clone replicating Apple's visual language, spacing, and modern responsive layout.

title: Flutter Website Ecosystem
description: A modern informational webpage showcasing the Flutter ecosystem with structured sections, smooth scrolling, and a developer-focused layout.

title: Weathry – Weather App
description: A weather application that displays real-time weather information with a minimal interface and location-based data.

title: Online Piano
description: An interactive online piano that allows users to play musical notes directly from the browser using keyboard or mouse input.

title: Superhero Cards
description: A superhero-themed card-based UI showcasing characters with interactive hover effects and responsive layout.

title: Instagram Reels Section
description: A UI recreation of Instagram Reels featuring vertical video layouts and mobile-first interaction design.

title: Emoji & Alphabet Game
description: A fun educational game designed to help users learn alphabets using emojis with interactive gameplay mechanics.
